Change the way you work.

Solutions for school and business environments

Bring more enthusiasm to work floors and classrooms by adding interactivity, flexibility and collaborative optimization to the mix. Reduce the ‘sighs‘ and create more ‘oohs’ and ‘aahs’.
Schools Business

Be it in the classroom.

Digitize your classroom

As a creator of interactive technologies for the classroom, we bring you a wide array of hard- and software solutions for education. Talk to us about anything EdTech, from interactive displays & boards to hybrid teaching

Or on the work floor.

Create your digital workspace

Create an environment where a collaborative culture and creativity is able to boom. Experience the kind of meetings that allow your whole team to interact without limitations.

Comprehensive business and education software

On the ‘soft’ side of things we’ll keep you organized and secure. Manage our hard -and software through an intuitive cloud solution or use one of our many applications to enhance collaboration and create engagement.

So who are we ?

i3-Technologies has been helping companies and schools level up since 1968. With more than 90 locations globally, we're happy to help you anywhere.
